title: 3dISC
description: Program for Voxelwise Inter-Subject Correlation (ISC) Analysis using linear mixed-effects modeling.

outfile_prefix.title: Output file prefix
outfile_prefix.description: Output file name. For AFNI format, provide prefix only, with no view+suffix needed.

num_jobs.title: Number of jobs
num_jobs.description: Specify the number of jobs to run concurrently. Choose 1 for a single-processor computer.

mask_file.title: Mask file
mask_file.description: Process voxels inside this mask only. Default is no masking.

model_structure.title: Model structure formula
model_structure.description: Specify the model structure for all the variables. The expression FORMULA with more than one variable has to be surrounded within quotes.

qvar_centers.title: Quantitative variable centers
qvar_centers.description: Specify centering values for quantitative variables identified under -qVars. Multiple centers are separated by commas without spaces and should be within quotes.

quantitative_vars.title: Quantitative variables
quantitative_vars.description: Identify quantitative variables (or covariates). The list should be comma-separated and within quotes.

fisher_transform.title: Fisher transformation flag
fisher_transform.description: Perform Fisher transformation on the response variable (input files) if it is a correlation value.

io_functions.title: IO Functions
io_functions.description: Use AFNI's C io functions (default) or R's io functions.

data_table.title: Data table
data_table.description: List the data structure with a header as the first line. Has to occur last in the script.
